about.summary: Computes entropy-based segregation indices, as developed by Theil (1971) <isbn:978-0471858454>, with a focus on  the Mutual Information Index (M) and Theil's Information Index (H).  The M, further described by Mora and Ruiz-Castillo (2011) <doi:10.1111/j.1467-9531.2011.01237.x> and Frankel and Volij (2011) <doi:10.1016/j.jet.2010.10.008>,  is a measure of segregation that is highly decomposable. The package provides tools to decompose the index by units and groups (local segregation),  and by within and between terms. Includes standard error estimation by bootstrapping.

name: r-segregation
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.3.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-segregation
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: segregation_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/segregation_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/segregation/segregation_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 13a178ae1af60a569f323b332233e5fb134c98140be857e63e7dc6059be0a32f

build:
  noarch: generic
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-data.table
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-data.table

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('segregation')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('segregation')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://github.com/elbersb/segregation
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Computes entropy-based segregation indices, as developed by Theil (1971) <isbn:978-0471858454>,
    with a focus on  the Mutual Information Index (M) and Theil's Information Index
    (H).  The M, further described by Mora and Ruiz-Castillo (2011) <doi:10.1111/j.1467-9531.2011.01237.x>
    and Frankel and Volij (2011) <doi:10.1016/j.jet.2010.10.008>,  is a measure of segregation
    that is highly decomposable. The package provides tools to decompose the index by
    units and groups (local segregation),  and by within and between terms. Includes
    standard error estimation by bootstrapping.
  license_family: MIT

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - apcamargo
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
